items.title: Newark air traffic controllers lost contact with planes again in overnight outage
items.content: Air traffic controllers in charge of Newark again lost contact with planes on Friday, the FAA said.
items.contentSnippet: Air traffic controllers in charge of Newark again lost contact with planes on Friday, the FAA said.

items.title: Something 'striking' is happening with apartment renters
items.content: More renters are choosing to stay in their apartments when their leases are up.
items.contentSnippet: More renters are choosing to stay in their apartments when their leases are up.

items.title: ESPN will call its forthcoming flagship streaming app simply 'ESPN,' sources say
items.content: ESPN decided to name the streaming application "ESPN" to simplify what has become a confusing streaming landscape.
items.contentSnippet: ESPN decided to name the streaming application "ESPN" to simplify what has become a confusing streaming landscape.

items.title: Candy giant Ferrero adds American twists to Nutella, Ferrero Rocher to fuel U.S. growth
items.content: Ferrero has been investing in growing its U.S. sales for the last decade through an acquisition spree and introducing its iconic brands to consumers stateside.
items.contentSnippet: Ferrero has been investing in growing its U.S. sales for the last decade through an acquisition spree and introducing its iconic brands to consumers stateside.

items.title: Startup Teal Health wins FDA approval for at-home test for cervical cancer screening
items.content: In clinical trials, the accuracy of self-testing with Teal's wand matched that of a cancer screening performed in a doctor's office.
items.contentSnippet: In clinical trials, the accuracy of self-testing with Teal's wand matched that of a cancer screening performed in a doctor's office.

items.title: Art market offers investors 'escape' from volatile stocks, Christie's CEO says
items.content: Christie's, Sotheby's and Phillips are together offering 295 works at auction next week for a low-end estimate of $952 million combined, according to ArtTactic.
items.contentSnippet: Christie's, Sotheby's and Phillips are together offering 295 works at auction next week for a low-end estimate of $952 million combined, according to ArtTactic.

items.title: Krispy Kreme stock plunges after doughnut chain pauses McDonald's rollout, pulls outlook
items.content: Krispy Kreme is pausing its nationwide rollout with McDonald's to focus on profitability.
items.contentSnippet: Krispy Kreme is pausing its nationwide rollout with McDonald's to focus on profitability.

items.title: Bill Gates doubles giving to $200 billion, says philanthropists can't cover government cuts
items.content: The Microsoft billionaire criticized Elon Musk for his role in crucial cuts to foreign aid.
items.contentSnippet: The Microsoft billionaire criticized Elon Musk for his role in crucial cuts to foreign aid.

items.title: Restaurant Brands earnings miss as Burger King, Popeyes and Tim Hortons post same-store sales declines
items.content: Restaurant Brands International missed first-quarter earnings and revenue estimates as same-store sales fell at Burger King, Popeyes and Tim Hortons.
items.contentSnippet: Restaurant Brands International missed first-quarter earnings and revenue estimates as same-store sales fell at Burger King, Popeyes and Tim Hortons.

items.title: The AI startup that stood out in an otherwise drab month for family office deals
items.content: Billionaire family offices including Ray Dalio's have flocked to SandboxAQ.
items.contentSnippet: Billionaire family offices including Ray Dalio's have flocked to SandboxAQ.

items.title: FC Mother wants to leverage global soccer fandom to improve maternal health
items.content: The organization is kicking off what it's calling the "World Cup of Healing" — a competition that measures health outcomes of the participating women.
items.contentSnippet: The organization is kicking off what it's calling the "World Cup of Healing" — a competition that measures health outcomes of the participating women.

items.title: Saudi sovereign wealth fund PIF deepens investment in women's professional golf
items.content: The Public Investment Fund will become the title partner of five events that will take place on the the Ladies European Tour.
items.contentSnippet: The Public Investment Fund will become the title partner of five events that will take place on the the Ladies European Tour.

items.title: Carvana's record quarterly results top Wall Street expectations
items.content: Carvana's first-quarter results easily topped Wall Street's expectations as the company reported record sales.
items.contentSnippet: Carvana's first-quarter results easily topped Wall Street's expectations as the company reported record sales.

items.title: March Madness drags down Flutter first-quarter results
items.content: CEO Peter Jackson said he anticipates customers will maintain their spending on online sports and casino games amid global economic concerns
items.contentSnippet: CEO Peter Jackson said he anticipates customers will maintain their spending on online sports and casino games amid global economic concerns

items.title: Why U.S. air traffic control is stretched so thin — and the fight to fix it
items.content: An outage of radio and radar systems controllers use to guide planes into Newark last week exposed decades of underinvestment and staffing shortages.
items.contentSnippet: An outage of radio and radar systems controllers use to guide planes into Newark last week exposed decades of underinvestment and staffing shortages.

items.title: Disney announces an Abu Dhabi theme park and resort
items.content: The Abu Dhabi park will be Disney's seventh theme park resort and it will be fully developed and built by partner Miral.
items.contentSnippet: The Abu Dhabi park will be Disney's seventh theme park resort and it will be fully developed and built by partner Miral.

items.title: Netflix unveils revamped homepage and app with OpenAI-powered search tool
items.content: The new features will include more visible shortcuts to finding content and real-time recommendations that respond to viewers' moods and interests.
items.contentSnippet: The new features will include more visible shortcuts to finding content and real-time recommendations that respond to viewers' moods and interests.

items.title: Used vehicle pricing barometer jumps to highest level since 2023 amid auto tariffs
items.content: Manheim's Used Vehicle Value Index that tracks used vehicle prices sold at U.S. wholesale auctions increased 4.9% last month to its highest level since 2023.
items.contentSnippet: Manheim's Used Vehicle Value Index that tracks used vehicle prices sold at U.S. wholesale auctions increased 4.9% last month to its highest level since 2023.

items.title: Disney shares climb 10% on surprise uptick in streaming subscribers, earnings beat
items.content: Disney upped some of its fiscal 2025 guidance and posted revenue growth in all three of its business segments.
items.contentSnippet: Disney upped some of its fiscal 2025 guidance and posted revenue growth in all three of its business segments.

items.title: Banks are keeping credit card rates high even after the CFPB rule they blamed for high APRs was killed
items.content: Retail cards hit a record high average interest rate of 30.5% last year, and rates have stayed close to those levels this year.
items.contentSnippet: Retail cards hit a record high average interest rate of 30.5% last year, and rates have stayed close to those levels this year.

items.title: Rivian cuts 2025 delivery target, ups expected spending amid tariff pressures
items.content: Rivian's new guidance includes deliveries of between 40,000 units and 46,000 units, and expenditures of between $1.8 billion and $1.9 billion.
items.contentSnippet: Rivian's new guidance includes deliveries of between 40,000 units and 46,000 units, and expenditures of between $1.8 billion and $1.9 billion.

items.title: Mattel CEO says toy manufacturing won't come to America, but price hikes will
items.content: Mattel CEO Ynon Kreiz says toy manufacturing will not come to America, but price increases will.
items.contentSnippet: Mattel CEO Ynon Kreiz says toy manufacturing will not come to America, but price increases will.

items.title: Comcast's cable spinoff to be named Versant, picked to emphasize corporate versatility
items.content: Comcast's SpinCo, which will include USA, MSNBC, CNBC and E!, will be renamed Versant to emphasize corporate versatility and adaptability, the company said.
items.contentSnippet: Comcast's SpinCo, which will include USA, MSNBC, CNBC and E!, will be renamed Versant to emphasize corporate versatility and adaptability, the company said.

items.title: Hispanic shoppers are spending less on groceries, putting pressure on consumer companies
items.content: Coca-Cola, Constellation Brands and Colgate-Palmolive reported that Hispanic consumers are spending less, which weighed on their North American sales.
items.contentSnippet: Coca-Cola, Constellation Brands and Colgate-Palmolive reported that Hispanic consumers are spending less, which weighed on their North American sales.

items.title: Former LPGA golfer Michelle Wie West invests in women's sports company Togethxr

items.contentSnippet: CNBC caught up with former LPGA star Michelle Wie-West about retirement and her passion for pushing women's sports forward.

items.title: Comcast's Xfinity Mobile takes over naming rights of Philadelphia arena
items.content: Comcast's Xfinity Mobile will become the new name of the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia, which is home to the NHL's Flyers and NBA's 76ers.
items.contentSnippet: Comcast's Xfinity Mobile will become the new name of the Wells Fargo Center in Philadelphia, which is home to the NHL's Flyers and NBA's 76ers.

items.title: Luxury carmaker Ferrari warns of U.S. tariff risks after 17% jump in first-quarter profit
items.content: Luxury carmaker Ferrari on Tuesday reported a significant upswing in first-quarter profit, citing robust demand for personalized vehicles.
items.contentSnippet: Luxury carmaker Ferrari on Tuesday reported a significant upswing in first-quarter profit, citing robust demand for personalized vehicles.

items.title: Ford suspends 2025 guidance amid $2.5 billion tariff impact
items.content: Ford Motor beat Wall Street's first-quarter expectations, but suspended its 2025 financial guidance amid an expected $2.5 billion impact this year from tariffs.
items.contentSnippet: Ford Motor beat Wall Street's first-quarter expectations, but suspended its 2025 financial guidance amid an expected $2.5 billion impact this year from tariffs.

items.title: Trump signs order to boost domestic drug manufacturing as pharma tariffs loom
items.content: The order comes ahead of Trump's planned tariffs on pharmaceuticals imported into the U.S.
items.contentSnippet: The order comes ahead of Trump's planned tariffs on pharmaceuticals imported into the U.S.

items.title: Newark air traffic controllers couldn't see or talk to planes, leading to last week's airport meltdown
items.content: The FAA said air traffic controllers took time off to recover from the stress of the event.
